otherNames: Lunhui Zhi Wuxian Jinhua, Infinite Evolution of Reincarnation, Lúnhuí Zhī Wúxiàn Jìnhuà, Reincarnation: Infinite Evolution, 轮回之无限进化
synopsis: Under the shadow of doomsday, between terminal illness and despair, Ling Yi accidentally fell into the endless cycle of reincarnation in the manor of the gods. Here, every evolution is a challenge to survival. Ling Yi and his partners travel through conspiracies and mysteries, uncovering the shocking secrets hidden behind evolution!
